id: Notion invoice template for your brand
name: Notion invoice template for your brand
description: Create simple invoices that fits your brandThis template is made to help you quickly create an invoice. You can change the cover and icon to match your own branding.What's included?English versionFrench versionFAQsHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.Still have questions?Send your feedback or requests to stenuit.jeremy@gmail.comFollow me on twitter for more Notion & Figma templates.
